A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars wasnt bad but it certainly wont be rewatched anytime soon. How many things do we have to watch the lame rebels scramble to blow up? Many scenes in this movie could of been done without all together. They were not written/directed/acted poorly\, just had no bearing on the plot and served only to lengthen the movie to get more cgi action scenes in it. Its not bad...its just painfully average and long.
